document_data.name: Lake Spirits
document_data.mainbody: '''The Lake Spirits''' was a three-storey stone and wood inn in [[Amnwater]], [[Amn]]. As of 1368 DR, it was owned and operated by [[Tehrinna]], and offered baths on the ground floor, with luxurious feather beds above.
